data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Santo Domingo, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.section_summary: On average, 173 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Santo Domingo.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 324,656 believers in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Japanese people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, help the 324,656 believers in Santo Domingo to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
